trans-unit.source: Represents derived classes known to be management instrumentation instance classes.
trans-unit.target: 代表衍生已知為 management instrumentation 執行個體類別的類別。

trans-unit.source: These derived classes inherit an implementation of <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.IInstance"></xref> that allows instances to be published through the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.IInstance.Published*> property.
trans-unit.target: 這些衍生的類別繼承的實作<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.IInstance"> </xref> ，可讓執行個體，以便透過發行<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.IInstance.Published*>屬性。</xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.IInstance.Published*>

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WMI.NET 程式庫目前被認為在最終狀態，而且沒有進一步開發之用，增強功能，或更新可供非安全性相關問題會影響這些程式庫。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.Instance"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.Instance"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別建構函式來初始化此類型中的狀態會呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether instances of classes that implement this interface are visible through management instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否實作這個介面的類別的執行個體可以經由管理檢測。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value `true`, if the instance is visible through management instrumentation; otherwise, `false` ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值`true`，如果執行個體是透過 management instrumentation 可見，否則`false`# #.NET Framework 安全性完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether instances of classes that implement this interface are visible through management instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出是否實作這個介面的類別的執行個體可以經由管理檢測。</xref:System.Boolean>
